title: Eastern Emyn Muil (4R231)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Raider
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Each Ring-bound companion moving from site 2T must exert twice. Maneuver: Discard this condition and exert a [Raider] Man to exert a Ringbound companion.
Lore:	The Emyn Muil was a strange, twisted knot of hills.
Rarity:	R
